entry.title: Indian National Pleads Guilty in Case Involving â€˜Largest Single Cryptocurrency and Cash Seizure in DEA Historyâ€™
entry.summary:
An Indian national has pleaded guilty in a case involving â€œthe largest single cryptocurrency and cash seizureâ€ in the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) history. The defendant â€œis designated as a Consolidated Priority Target, which makes him one of the most significant drug trafficking threats in the world,â€ the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) described.
This Case Involves Largest Single Cryptocurrency and Cash Seizure in DEA History, Says DOJ
The U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) announced Friday that a 40-year-old Indian national, Banmeet Singh, has pleaded guilty to â€œrunning a dark web narcotics conspiracy.â€ Specifically, he pleaded guilty to conspiracy to possess with the intent to distribute controlled substances and conspiracy to commit money laundering. The announcement â€¦

entry.title: Bitcoin Seizure: Silk Road Perpetrator Pleads Guilty In 8,100 BTC Confiscation Case
entry.summary:
A prominent British narcotics trafficker involved in the United States Drug Enforcement Agencyâ€™s (DEA) largest-ever Bitcoin (BTC) seizure has admitted to operating an extensive network of illicit online marketplaces, as revealed by the US Department of Justice (DOJ).
Massive Dark Web Drug Operation Exposed
The defendant, Banmeet Singh, a 40-year-old Indian national from Haldwani, India, pleaded guilty to charges of conspiracy to possess controlled substances with the intent to distribute and conspiracy to commit money laundering.Â
Singhâ€™s criminal enterprise allegedly facilitated the sale and distribution of various controlled substances, including fentanyl, LSD, ecstasy, Xanax, Ketamine, and Tramadol, through vendor marketing sites on notorious dark web platforms such as Silk Road 1â€¦

Peter Brandt Highlights Bitcoin Price Pattern Key to Keeping BTCâ€™s Bull Trend Healthy
entry.summary:
Veteran trader Peter Brandt has highlighted a bitcoin price pattern that frequently appeared in past major bull runs. â€œIt is the Hump â€¦Slump â€¦Pumpâ€¦ Dump [HSPD] that keeps a bull trend healthy,â€ he explained, emphasizing: â€œStudy past major bull runs in bitcoin and you will discover they were replete with HSPDs.â€
Bitcoin Bull Runs and HSPD Pattern
Veteran trader Peter Brandt shared his observation about bitcoinâ€™s price pattern he called the â€œHump, Slump, Pump, Dumpâ€ (HSPD) on social media platform X Sunday.
â€œThe old â€˜Hump with a Slump then a Pump and a Dumpâ€™ is back â€” and this is the price behavior that separates Chumps from their money,â€ the trader described. â€œStudy past major bull runs in bitcoin (BTC) and you will discover they were replete with HSPDs. The Chumps FOMO [fear of missing out] buy the Pump only to puke out their purchases with the Dump.â€ Brandt opined:
It is the Humpâ€¦Slumpâ€¦Pumpâ€¦Dump that keeps a bull trend healthy. Letâ€™s see if HSPD works its magic once again.
Brandt regularly provides analysis of bitcoinâ€™s price. He has also made several bullish statements about the cryptocurrency. On Jan. 18, he wrote on X: â€œI have a macro bias in bitcoin in a very broad sense â€” that BTC is a best candidate to be a tremendous store of value against the destruction of fiat.â€ On Jan. 6, he wrote: â€œBitcoin is primary a store-of-value IMO and still has massive opportunities to appreciate. I think everything is junk, including ETH.â€
However, the trader is skeptical about the impact of the Bitcoin halving on the price of BTC. On Dec. 21 last year, he explained on X: â€œThe Bitcoin halving hype is a whole lot of excitement over nothing. Sure, halving hype might temporarily impact price. But the reduction of supply as % of daily volume is the size of a gnatâ€™s ass.â€
What do you think about Peter Brandtâ€™s bitcoin price analysis? Do you think a bitcoin bull run is coming soon? Let us know in the comments section below.

entry.summary:
A new Binance survey has found that 73% of European respondents are optimistic about the future of crypto, with 55% exclusively using cryptocurrencies for everyday purchases. â€œWe are delighted to see the high level of optimism amongst European crypto users, reflecting the growing interest in crypto and blockchain technologies,â€ said Binanceâ€™s CMO.
Europe â€˜Actively Paving the Way for Mainstream Adoption of Digital Assetsâ€™
Cryptocurrency exchange Binance recently surveyed its European users in France, Spain, Italy, and Sweden to understand their crypto investing habits. The survey was conducted between Oct. 14 and Nov. 8, 2023, with 10,498 participants. The results were released on Jan. 24.
According to the results, 73% of respondents are optimistic about the future of cryptocurrency, â€¦

entry.title: Amazon Greenlights Film Exposing Bitfinex Hackerâ€™s $3 Billion Money Laundering Scheme
entry.summary:
The real-life story of an American couple accused of laundering billions of dollars worth of Bitcoin stolen from the 2016 hacking of Bitfinex is set to hit the big screen, with Amazon and MGM Studios collaborating on the production.Â
The film, titled â€œRazzlekhan,â€ draws inspiration from a 2022 article in The New York Times and will be directed by Hannah Marks, known for her work on â€œDonâ€™t Make Me Goâ€ in the anticipated Amazon production.Â
Amazon To Adapt True Story Of Bitcoin Heist
According to a Deadline report, the Amazon-backed production film will revolve around the true story of Ilya Lichtenstein and Heather Morgan, a millennial couple who masterminded the theft of over $3 billion in cryptocurrency.
Eventually apprehended by the Department of Justice (DOJ), the coupleâ€™s criminâ€¦

entry.title: Stellar Development Foundation Votes to Delay Protocol 20 Upgrade Amid Bug Concerns
entry.summary:
The Stellar Development Foundation wishes to put a hold on the upcoming Protocol 20 upgrade of the Stellar blockchain network, originally scheduled for January 30. This decision follows the discovery of a bug that could impact the Soroban smart contract transactions.
Stellar Development Foundation Wants to Hit Pause on Protocol 20 Upgrade Due to Critical Bug
The Stellar Development Foundation (SDF) has announced a delay in the Protocol 20 upgrade of the Stellar blockchain, originally scheduled for January 30. The decision follows the discovery of a bug in Stellar Core v20.1.0, which could potentially impact Soroban transactions.
The SDF, in a blog post dated January 27, expressed its commitment to ensuring the networkâ€™s readiness for the upgrade, but also the importance of consensus â€¦

entry.summary:
Earlier in September 2023, the New York Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) delisted Rippleâ€™s native token, XRP, from its green list. As a result, pro-Ripple lawyer James Murphy fired back, demanding the financial service agency substantiate its reasons for removing the XRP token.Â
US Lawyer Investigates XRP Delisting
During a recent interview on the Digital Perspectives YouTube crypto channel with host Bradley Kimes, Murphy delved into the latest developments in the court case between XRP and the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The pro-Ripple lawyer placed emphasis on Judge Analisa Torresâ€™s court decision in July, where she ruled that programmatic sales of XRP were not classified as securities.Â
According to Murphy, less than two months after Judge Torreâ€¦

entry.title: Kresus App and Tools for Humanity Forge Web3 Partnership
entry.summary:
On Monday, Kresus, the Web3 platform specializing in cryptocurrencies and non-fungible tokens (NFTs), unveiled a collaboration with Tools for Humanity, the creators of the Worldcoin initiative and the World ID identification system.
World ID Meets Kresus App
Kresus and Tools for Humanity (TFH) have unveiled a new partnership. In a joint effort, World ID will be integrated into the Kresus App, a crypto and NFT application accessible on both Appleâ€™s App Store and Google Play. Furthermore, Kresus Labs will provide guidance to TFH on product strategy and engage in a collaborative effort for technical implementation, as outlined in the official announcement sent to Bitcoin.com News.
The Kresus App provides users with a Web3 .kresus address and an array of identity tools to streamline tranâ€¦

entry.title: Hong Kongâ€™s SFC Issues Warning on Flokiâ€™s â€˜Highly Riskyâ€™ Staking Programs
entry.summary:
A Hong Kong watchdog, the SFC, has cautioned investors about the enticing yet potentially risky â€˜Floki Staking Programâ€™ and â€˜Tokenfi Staking Program,â€™ which offer high annualized returns without the required regulatory green light.
SFC Warns Against Unregulated Floki and Tokenfi Crypto Staking Programs
The Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) has issued a public warning against the â€œFloki Staking Programâ€ and â€œTokenfi Staking Program,â€ two crypto-related investment products promising unusually high returns.
Both programs, associated with the Floki ecosystem, offer cryptocurrency staking services with promised annualized returns ranging from 30% to over 100%. However, the SFC states that these products have not received the necessary authorization for public offering in Hâ€¦

Spot Bitcoin ETF Inflows Is A Metric To Monitor Closely
Taking to X on January 28, Mow believes that the influx of capital into Bitcoin-linked exchange-traded funds (ETFs) could play a pivotal role in driving adoption and price in the coming weeks and months. entry.title: 9 Newly Launched Spot Bitcoin ETFs Accumulate BTC Holdings Worth Nearly $6 Billion
entry.summary:
Current data reveals that Blackrockâ€™s IBIT spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) currently possesses 52,025.76 bitcoin, with a total value of $2.18 billion. Furthermore, Fidelityâ€™s FBTC has increased its bitcoin holdings, now standing at 46,238.09 bitcoin as of Jan. 29, 2024.
Blackrock Snags 52,025 Bitcoin, While Fidelity Now Holds 46,238
Several of the nine new spot bitcoin ETFs have amassed even more bitcoin, as indicated by their recent company statements. Excluding Grayscaleâ€™s GBTC, Blackrockâ€™s IBIT takes the lead as the largest spot BTC ETF in terms of bitcoin holdings. On Jan. 29, the web portal displayed that the fund holds 52,025.76 BTC. Fidelity has also bolstered its FBTC holdings, rising from 43,855.14 BTC on January 26 to the current 46,238.09 BTC.
The third-largest â€¦

entry.title: Google Revises Guidelines To Allow Bitcoin ETFs To Advertise Their Products
entry.summary:
Today, Google has revised its advertising guidelines, now permitting cryptocurrency trusts, such as Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), to promote their products. Spot Bitcoin ETF issuers such as BlackRock and Franklin Templeton have wasted no time in marketing their funds, with advertisements already starting to emerge.
This revision comes at an interesting time as the discussion around Bitcoin ETFs continues to gains momentum, after the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approvedÂ the first batch of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the country. Google's decision to allow advertising for Bitcoin ETFs provides these financial instruments with a much broader reach and exposure to a wider audience. The updated guidelines mean that companies managing Bitcoin ETFs can now leverage Google's advertising platform to raise awareness and attract investors. This change could contribute to increased visibility and understanding of Bitcoin ETFs among both institutional and retail investors. Google's decision aligns with the growing acceptance of Bitcoin and related investment products in mainstream finance. The move is likely to help foster a more innovative environment for Bitcoin, as it integrates more into traditional financial markets. As the industry eagerly awaits to see how well these revised guidelines are for the Bitcoin ETFs, the impact on the advertising landscape for them could be substantial.
